ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 1pm and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Partly sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 79 in the afternoon. South wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
